projects.title: DataSpark
projects.description: A web based Data Science platform for users to upload, download rate and review different datasets. Comprehensive details regarding the uploaded and approved datasets are also displayed for user convenience. This project was built using Python, React JS, Flask and MySQL.

projects.title: Telco Customer Churn
projects.description: A web based application that provides customer churn prediction and an interactive dashboard for derivation of valuable insights to proactively retain customers.This project was built using Python, Scikit-learn, Flask, Power BI, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Human Resource Management System
projects.description: A web application to manage a company’s employee details, leave details and derive reports for comprehensive analysis of the company’s human resource.

projects.title: Retail Sales Prediction
projects.description: An analytics solution to address the sales demand estimation problem of a retail chain leveraging multiple datasets regarding item details, sales and promotions to predict the weekly sales of items. This project was done for Data Storm 3.0 organized by OCTAVE and our solution won the first prize.

projects.title: USA Accidents Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard was built upon the elaborate analysis performed on the US-Accidents dataset containing over 2 million records. Insights that demonstrate the cause and effect principles to anticipate accidents and influence of environmental stimuli on accidents were derived and presented via a Power BI dashboard. Python libraries and DAX were used for this project.

projects.title: WeatherSpark
projects.description: A web based software system that provides short-term predictions of air temperature and interactive dashboard for analysis of weather data. This was developed using Python, TensorFlow, Flask, React JS, Chart.js and Mongo DB.

projects.title: Renewable Energy Site Selection
projects.description: This project was developed for the APAN56 datathon to build a city recommendation solution for wind and solar energy projects, harnessing weather and geographical data in various regions of Sri Lanka. The competition tasks involved EDA, Feature Engineering, Resource Efficiency Identification, Cost-Effective Construction, ROI Modelling and Site Recommendation Strategy. Our team was placed in the top 7.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Classification
projects.description: A Deep Neural Network solution to detect brain tumors using MRI scans. The dataset was composed of over 3000 images classified into 4 classes. This solution was developed for the final phase of Tech-Triathlon organized by Rootcode Labs.
